title: Ultimate Hero
description:
Chaos grips the land as factions vie for ever greater power. In these tumultuous times, heroes rise—heroes who have even overthrown the gods. To counter this new threat, the gods have chosen you as their avatar, one who can wield their divine power. The weight of great responsibility now rests on your shoulders: disguise yourself as masters of various styles to learn all forms of martial arts, sow discord among the factions, and deliver bloody retribution where needed. It’s time to shake up the chessboard of destiny Lost Skies
[Master Numerous Characters]
Say goodbye to your old self and assume the guise of one of nearly 30 martial geniuses—one at a time! Harness their talents and abilities as your own, and rise to the top!
[Collect Relics]
Discard cards like a champ and use your dice wisely to gain the upper hand. Preparation is half the battle—alter your dice with skills and turn the tide in times of danger. Collect over 200 relics to enhance your strength . Choose the best combinations that suit your style and crush all opposition!
